description: Protractor target options for Build Facade.
title: Protractor Target

___devServerTarget.description: Dev server target to run tests against.

___protractorConfig.description: The name of the Protractor configuration file.

___port.description: The port to use to serve the application.

___specs.description: Override specs in the protractor config.

___elementExplorer.description: Start Protractor's Element Explorer for debugging.

___baseUrl.description: Base URL for protractor to connect to.

___suite.description: Override suite in the protractor config.
